original_text: He did not say this because he cared about the poor but because he was a thief; as keeper of the money bag, he used to help himself to what was put into it.
korean_text: 이렇게 말함은 가난한 자들을 생각함이 아니요 그는 도둑이라 돈궤를 맡고 거기 넣는 것을 훔쳐 감이러라

sentences.original_text: because he cared about the poor
but because he was a thief
as keeper of the money bag
he used to help himself to what was put into it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 안에 들어간 것을 훔쳐서 사용하곤 했다
